Name: Legend of Orion: Adventure
About the game: Legend of Orion: Adventure is a dungeon-building adventure and hack 'n slash game. Craft your own dungeons to share with your friends online, build up the defenses in your treasure vault to defend against thieves and monsters alike, or take control of your customizable Treasure Hunter, as you fight and traverse your way through user-created dungeons, in the search for items or power and most importantly, GOLD!
